item.title: Trump security boosted weeks ago over 'Iranian plot' to kill him
item.description: There is no known link between the plot and Saturday's attack, but the disclosure raises questions over how a gunman got so close.

item.title: Exclusive: Secret Service ramped up security after receiving intel of Iranian plot to assassinate Trump; no known connection to shooting - CNN
item.description:
1. Exclusive: Secret Service ramped up security after receiving intel of Iranian plot to assassinate Trump; no known connection to shooting  CNN
  2. U.S. Detected Potential Iranian Plot to Kill Trump Separate From Saturday’s Shooting  The New York Times
  3. Trump assassination attempt live updates: U.S. learned of Iranian plot to kill Trump in recent weeks  NBC News
  4. Iran threat prompted more security at Trump rally as officials warn of potential for copycat attacks  The Associated Press
  5. NSC warned Secret Service about an increased Iranian threat to Trump  NPR

item.title: Sen. Bob Menendez found guilty on all counts, including acting as foreign agent, in federal corruption trial - ABC News
item.description:
1. Sen. Bob Menendez found guilty on all counts, including acting as foreign agent, in federal corruption trial  ABC News
  2. Four Senate Democrats signal they would vote to expel Menendez  The Hill
  3. Menendez Convicted of Corruption in Broad International Conspiracy  The New York Times
  4. Menendez guilty verdicts give New York prosecutors a win after high-profile setbacks  POLITICO
  5. Sen. Bob Menendez guilty of taking bribes in cash and gold and acting as Egypt's foreign agent  The Associated Press

item.title: News live: Tony Abbott doubts Australian political assassination ‘imminent’; Bowen warns of coal’s threat to power grid reliability
item.description:
Former PM says ‘constant vigilance’ required but Australia blessed to not have gun culture or history of political violence

Tim Ayres flags ‘proportionate’ federal response to CFMEU

A Labor senator says that federal intervention into alleged criminal behaviour within the CFMEU will be effective and proportionate, AAP reports.

Tony and the team in there are doing the careful work of making sure that the government’s response is effective, well-weighted and effective.

While I don’t forecast the debates in terms of the national executive, we have received these requests from the premiers, we will act upon them, and we’ll act in accordance with the requests from the premiers.

We’re very blessed in this country. We don’t have a gun culture, we don’t have a history of political violence, we don’t at this point in time – thank God – have the fragmentation and polarisation that sadly exists in America to quite the same extent.

So look, can you rule these things out? Of course not. Do I expect it? Well, maybe some time in the next 100 or 200 years, sure. Almost anything could happen in that period of time. But is is imminent? I doubt it very much.

Continue reading...

item.title: Former White House official accused of acting as South Korea agent
Trump Shooter Was “Definitely” Conservative, Ex-Classmate Says
